title: Research
text:
Deans’ Summer Research Fellowship
Summer of 2024, I worked independently under Prof. Alexander Volfovsky & Prof. Robin Evans investigating noisy measurements of confounders.
I presented a poster at the Undergraduate Research symposium, which can be found here.
Further, I created software for the new method, which can be found here.
